Package com.ae2dms.GameObject.Objects

Class Crate

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.GameObject.AbstractGameObject
com.ae2dms.GameObject.Objects.Crate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable, java.io.Serializable
public class Crate
extends AbstractGameObject
implements Movable
Crate that Player can move, all Crate on Diamond means victory
